title: Megamaai Vandhu Pogiren Lyrics Thulladha Manamum Thullum
stanzas:
Megamaai vandhu pogiren
vennila unnai thaedinen

Megamaai vandhu pogiren
vennila unnai thaedinen
yaaridam thoothu solvadhu
endru naan unnai servathu.

en anbae...
en anbae...
Megamaai vandhu pogiren
vennila unnai thaedinen

urangaamalae ularal varum
idhuthaano aarambam
adadaa manam pariponathe
adhilthaano inbam

kadhal azhagaanathaa
illai arivaanathaa
kadhal sugamaanathaa
illai sumaiyaanathaa

Megamaai vandhu pogiren
vennila unnai thaedinen(2)

nee vandhathum
mazhai vanthadhu
nenjengum aanandham

nee pesinaal en solayil
engengum poovaasam
en kadhal nila
endru vaasam varum
andha naal vandhuthaan
ennil swasam varum

Megamaai vandhu pogiren
vennila unnai thaedinen (2)
yaaridam thoothu solvadhu
endru naan unnai servathu.
